description: Put a smile on your guests faces with this DIY ice-cream sundae board. Everyone will love creating their own sundaes as much as they'll love eating them.
name: Ice-Cream Sundae Board Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 6 pieces Woolworths choc honeycomb, roughly chopped
0.5 cup unsalted roasted peanuts, roughly chopped

recipeInstructions.text: Arrange all the ingredients, except ice-cream, in separate bowls (see Tip) or on a board or platter. Place ice-cream in 8 jars or glasses. Serve and allow everyone to make their own sundaes.
